thread.title: US Airways will say farewell after Denver-bound flight
thread.title_full: US Airways will say farewell after Denver-bound flight

author: Brandon Brown
title: US Airways will say farewell after Denver-bound flight
text:
See All Homes of the Day Those will be the last flights to operate under the US Airways name following its merger with American Airlines (Nasdaq: AAL). As of Oct. 17, all flights by the merged airline will operate under the American brand. Since the airlines' merger was completed in December 2013, US Airways and American have slowly converged many parts of the business, including reservation systems and frequent-flier rewards systems. Combined, American and US Airways account for about 6.3 percent of passenger traffic at Denver International Airport , making it DIA's fourth-largest carrier after United Airlines, Southwest Airlines and Frontier Airlines. This story was adapted for Denver by the DBJ's Mark Harden.
